pages.text: $(li)The Globe is a decoration block with a unique randomly generated to every world seed.$(br)$(li)If you click on a Globe or give it a redstone pulse, it will spin and display your current coordinates.

$(br)$(li)It can only obtained buying it from a Wandering Trader or be found in Shipwrecks.$(br)$(li)It can also interact with Comparators.$(br)$(li)Those receive a redstone signal that depends on it's current face and a full strength one while it's spinning.
